mapper.select: SELECT BOARDNO, USERNAME, TITLE, CNT, TO_CHAR(B.CDATETIME) AS CDATETIME FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON B.USERID = M.USERID ORDER BY BOARDNO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARDNO, TITLE, CONTENTS, USERID, CNT, CDATETIME, UDATETIME) VALUES(BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{contents}, 'user01', 0 ,SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT BOARDNO, TITLE, CONTENTS FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON B.USERID = M.USERID WHERE BOARDNO = #{boardNo} ORDER BY BOARDNO
